name: Snow Combat 5
description:
This game was made in 3 hours for Friday Night Game Jam #2020-38.

The theme was nostalgia. Back in the day when I got my PS2, the first two games I got for it were SSX3 and Ace Combat 5. Here is a strange amalgamation of those games! 

A & D to Roll (while in the air) or Yaw (while touching the ground)

W & S to Pitch

SPACEBAR to thrust
